text: jeonghayeojin nal-e dansig-eul haenghamyeon doena byeongjung-e issgeona yeohaengjung-e iss-eul ttaeneun daleun nallo daeyonghadoe bul ssanghan jaleul baebuleuge hayeo sogjoehalageuleona seuseulo jikil gyeong-uneun deo manh eun bosang-i iss-eumyeo dansig-eul haengham-eun neohoeege deoug joh-eunila sillo neo hoeneun alge doel geos-ila
